events.title: Q3 Strategy Meeting
events.description: A comprehensive meeting to outline the strategic goals for the third quarter, focusing on market expansion and product development.

events.title: Frontend Sync
events.description: Weekly sync-up for the frontend development team to discuss progress, blockers, and upcoming tasks for the current sprint.

events.title: Design System Review
events.description: A session to review recent updates to the design system, gather feedback, and plan for the next iteration of components.

events.title: Backend Architecture
events.description: A deep-dive workshop on the proposed microservices architecture for the new platform, covering scalability and security.

events.title: All-Hands Town Hall
events.description: Company-wide town hall to share quarterly results, celebrate wins, and answer questions from the team.
